00021 #include "util/CalvinChpCheck.h"
00022 //
00023 #include <cstdlib>
00024 #include <iostream>
00025 
00026 using namespace std;
00027 
00028 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00029   if(argc != 3) {
00030     cout << "usage: " << endl;
00031     cout << "   cc-chp-compare test.chp gold.chp" << endl;
00032     exit(0);
00033   }
00034   vector<string> test, gold;
00035   test.push_back(argv[1]);
00036   gold.push_back(argv[2]);
00037   cout << "Getting ready to check. " << endl;
00038   CalvinChpCheck checker(test, gold);
00039   string msg;
00040   if(!checker.check(msg))
00041     cout << "File not equivalent!!! " << msg << endl;
00042   else
00043     cout << "Files equivalent." << endl;
00044   return 0;
00045 }
